original_text: For the Lord will not forsake his people, for his great name's sake, because it has pleased the Lord to make you a people for himself.
korean_text: 여호와께서는 너희를 자기 백성으로 삼으신 것을 기뻐하셨으므로 여호와께서는 그의 크신 이름을 위해서라도 자기 백성을 버리지 아니하실 것이요

sentences.original_text: For the Lord will not forsake his people
because it has pleased the Lord
to make you a people for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 자기 소유의 백성으로 삼으신 것이
